content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.748 - Valve maintenance: service line valves

State Regulations
(a) Except as provided in subdivision (b) of
this section, buried high-pressure service line valves or exposed exterior
high-pressure service line valves shall be inspected in conjunction with the
service regulator inspection required under section
255.744
of this Part. (b) Buried service line valves used for
compliance with section
255.365
(b)(2)
of
this Part, shall be inspected at intervals not exceeding 15 months, but at
least once each calendar year, for accessibility, key alignment and external
leakage. (c) Each buried service
line valve inspection shall determine accessibility, key alignment and tests
for external leakage. Each exposed exterior service line valve shall be
inspected for accessibility and external leakage. Notes
